Changelog
=========
0.5 (2012-05-09)
---------------------
- Permanent sidebar viewlet and portlet manager

0.4 (2012-05-08)
---------------------
- More work on the CSS of the slideshow and the view of Objects

0.3 (2012-05-04)
---------------------
- A bit more CSS

0.2 (2012-05-02)
---------------------
- CSS, view for Objects

0.1dev (unreleased)
-------------------

- Initial release
